description:
Kick up a little dust. At the cottage or your local park, this bike is ready the next time a tree-lined trail or dirt road calls your name. With a great gear range and front suspension, neither hills nor potholes will put you off from riding to the end of the logging road and beyond.

  • SmartForm C3 alloy frame, with stable hardtail geometry
  • SR Suntour XCT suspension fork, with 100mm of travel
  • SAVE™ Micro-suspension uses strategically engineered flex zones in the rear triangle to smooth out the ride
  • 2x8 drive train pairs 36-22T chain rings with an 11-34T cassette
  • Shimano Altus and Acera derailleurs, with Pro Wheel crankset
  • Shimano Altus shifters with Rapidfire Plus™ technology lets you shift through up to 3 gears at a time
  • Tektro hydraulic disc brakes
  • Wheel size varies by bike size with XS and S equipped with 27.5 in., while M-XL wear 29 in
  • WTB Ranger Comp tires were developed for trail riding and offer lots of grip
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for a year after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Trail 6 Bicycle - Unisex
